message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its value to you, I believe we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Let me start with an offer of $1350000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value I place on the product, I would like to propose a price of $1250000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand the value you see in this product, but I need to maintain my minimum price to ensure profitability. I am willing to consider $1300000 as a counteroffer.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a price of $1275000 for the product.
Thank you for your latest proposal, Bob. I'm glad we're getting closer. I'm willing to consider $1290000 as a counteroffer.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Based on my valuation of the product, I would like to propose a price of $1285000.
I appreciate your offer, Bob. Considering the ongoing negotiations, I'm willing to accept $1288000 as a final counteroffer.
